definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: Before sleeping steep foot with the hot water are an acknowledged health the habit is well.
sentences.chinese: 睡前用熱水泡腳是一個公認的養生好習慣。

sentences.english: Used to soak the foot every day to drive the cold.
sentences.chinese: 平常可以每天泡腳驅除寒氣。

definition: to dawdle/to go slow deliberately/to fizzle out/to have all one's hopes dashed/(Tw) to have a soak in a hot spring
to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)
Yanshui town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
